What I found in a forum :"Finally i found way to play ss sentinels with 1.1 patch, without original cd in drive, 
There is no 1.1 nocd crack but files listed below is working if you read .nfo file, you must download all 4 files, this files is shared with e-mule but had less sources, i share this files too..Enjoy playing..is working %100 with 1.1 patch, try & see..  
08.16.04.Silent.Storm.Sentinels.Clone-CLONECD-ENG.bwa
08.16.04.Silent.Storm.Sentinels.Clone-CLONECD-ENG.bwi
08.16.04.Silent.Storm.Sentinels.Clone-CLONECD-ENG.bwt
08.16.04.Silent.Storm.Sentinels.Clone-CLONECD-ENG.nfo"

As for the version unpatch dont use any cd emulation software Alchol or other and I say uninstall any of them and use the crack for Sentinels 1.0 It is working I try it. 
Install game if you have it as image aplly crack and then uninstall CD emulation software and you will be able to play.

I FOUND ONE WAY FOR CRACK THE VERSION 1.1

1. Install the game
2. Copy the file "ar.exe" (i zip the file with winzip)
3. Install the patch 1.1
4. Install the crack version 1.0
5. Change the file "ar.exe" with file copy later (point 2)
6. Enjoy

Works fine to me.   :)
